6-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(k.keyword) AS movie_keyword, MIN(n.name) AS actor_name, MIN(t.title) AS marvel_movie
 FROM random_cast_info_1 AS ci,
 random_keyword_1 AS k,
 random_movie_keyword_1 AS mk,
 random_name_1 AS n,
 random_title_1 AS t
 WHERE k.id = mk.keyword_id
 AND t.id = mk.movie_id
 AND t.id = ci.movie_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND k.keyword = 'sex'
 AND n.name LIKE '%Nelson%'
 AND t.production_year > 1999;
